import sys

def maximum(l):
    maxi = 0
    val = 0
    count = {}
    for x in l:
        if x in count:
            count[x] += 1
        else:
            count[x] = 1
    for (k, v) in count.items():
        if v > maxi:
            maxi = v
            val = k
        elif (v == maxi) and (k < val):
            val = k
    print("%d  %d" % (val, maxi))
           

t = int(input())
while t:
    n = int(input())
    l = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().strip().split(" ")]
    maximum(l)
    t -= 1
